Author: rose_04
Text: thank you sm we’re actually in canada so professional help is pretty easy and cost free to come by however, she is not ready to recover atm

Author: littleginko
Text: I would say that it’s important to seek professional help because one step the wrong way could turn her BED to B/P or something else, or at least that’s my experience.  However I understand that professional help is expensive and scary, so maybe just being there for her is a good start. One of the main things is that she’s probably struggling to love herself/be happy so perhaps address that? I don’t know these are just the ramblings of someone who struggles also, but I hope this helps a little  It’s one helluva fight and it’s good that ur supporting her
